channel.title: Which logo should I use?
channel.description:
My logo on the disco will always stay the same, but what should I use for Soundcloud? Option 1: ![dd764d14a50479bac8e802b359982070f3dcbf4c_1_500x500|200x200](upload://tvMuQQpBWVjb8CWWEk5MtMy0GR.png) Option 2: ![dc729fea2682835a4c385b43137f8b0fb5aa0663_1_500x500|200x200](upload://Ald6lfBod8bF0FgsgIF2fTW4rIa.png) Option 3: ![Mr_Mooo%20Revised%20Logo|200x200](upload://rcJnI4xd0pi2oonfMll5SIToLr7.jpg) Option 4: ![ef9bcb2ea0e4363b6c294c958c6c66f930120eda_1_500x500|200x200](upload://uTLgvu7ApyVQK7f5iJJ2UZgXdur.png)
You can select up to two options
[poll type=multiple min=1 max=2 public=true]
* Option 1 * Option 2 * Option 3 * Option 4 [/poll]
Thanks! Mr Mooo
Edit: Forgot to mention but thanks to @Indigoo for option 4, @BobTheGUYYYYY for option 1 and 2, and @FLB100 for option 3 :slight_smile:
Edit 2: Ooops I voted for something accidentaly I can't unvote don't take my votes into consideration when you look at ths

item.title: Which logo should I use?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
I really like option 4, but option 2 is just epic x3

Read full topic
